abstract: |
  Neural Networks (NNs) have been able to solve PDEs using much less computational power than traditional methods such as FVM. Particularly, Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) and Fourier Neural Operators (FNOs) have shown great promise.
